sorcer.core.dispatch

Interface DispatcherFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExertDispatcherFactory, ExertionDispatcherFactory

    public interface DispatcherFactory
    This interface must be implemented by all factory classes used to create instances of subclasses of Dispatcher.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dispatcher createDispatcher(Job job, Provider provider)
      This method returns an instance of the appropriate subclass of Dispatcher as determined from information provided by the given instance of ServiceJob.
      Dispatcher createDispatcher(Job job, Provider provider, String... config) 

    • Method Detail

      • createDispatcher

        Dispatcher createDispatcher(Job job,
                          Provider provider)
                            throws DispatcherException
        This method returns an instance of the appropriate subclass of Dispatcher as determined from information provided by the given instance of ServiceJob.
        Parameters:
        job - The SORCER job that will be used to perform a collection of SERVICE tasks.
        Throws:
        DispatcherException

      • createDispatcher

                          Provider provider,
                          String... config)
